sentences.en: A washing - machine is a saver of time and strength.
sentences.cn: 洗衣机是一种省时省力的机械.

sentences.en: After a few second, the screen switch to the screen saver.
sentences.cn: 几秒钟后, 屏幕转换到屏幕保护状态.

sentences.en: Auto disable screen saver ( setting condition of disable screen saver )
sentences.cn: 自动禁止屏幕保护- ( 设置禁用屏幕保护的条件 )

sentences.en: Because the eyes professional guard can ( must ) replacewindows screen saver totally.
sentences.cn: 因为护眼专家可以 ( 同时必须要 )

sentences.en: How do I run in screen saver mode only?
sentences.cn: 我该如何运作[闲置时自动启动]模式?

sentences.en: If confiscation once began, it was he - the worker and the saver - who would be looted.
sentences.cn: 如果一旦把财产充公, 受到剥夺的倒反而是他这个克勤克俭的人.

sentences.en: Mutual funds have been attractive to small savers (= people who save small amounts of money ) .
sentences.cn: 共同基金对小额储户很有吸引力。

sentences.en: Our new washing machine is a real time - and money - saver.
sentences.cn: 我们新的洗衣机真的是台省时又省钱的装置.

sentences.en: Plug into the power socket by power saver BNC.
sentences.cn: 由节电器插头插入电源插座.

sentences.en: Software Description : About Shalom , This saver includes various religious pictures and text.
sentences.cn: 这个屏幕保护程序包括不同宗教的图画和文本.

sentences.en: The clothes - dryer was a life - saver during the wet weather.
sentences.cn: 天气潮湿时乾衣机可帮了大忙了.

sentences.en: The dyke has since been named The Life - Saver.
sentences.cn: 从此,人们就把这个堤称作救命堤.

sentences.en: The screen saver cannot be displayed on this monitor.
sentences.cn: 这个屏幕保护程序无法在这个监视器上显示.

sentences.en: This machine is a real time - saver.
sentences.cn: 这部机器是一部名副其实的省时装置.

sentences.en: Use this as the image displayed the screen saver.
sentences.cn: 使用这个图片作为屏幕保护.

sentences.en: Will the software run faster if I shut down the screen saver?
sentences.cn: 如果我将屏幕保护程序关闭,客户端是否能够运行得更快点?

words.tran_cn: 节约的；挽救的；补偿的；保留的
救助者；节俭的人；节约装置

phrases.tran_cn: n. 屏幕保护程序；视屏闲置画面

trans.tran_cn: 救助者，俭省的人，节约装置
